oshiSkill.name: ほうき星  ("Comet")
oshiSkill.description: [[Once per turn] When this Oshimen or your blue Holomen deal damage to opp backline's Holomen, you may use this to deal 50 special damage to one of opp backline's holomen

spOshiSkill.name: シューティングスター  ("Shooting Star")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] When your blue holomen deal damage to opp's center holomen or collab holomen, you may use this to deal same amount of  special damage to one of opp backline holomen

oshiSkill.name: 野兎たち~  ("Wild Rabbits")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable during your opponent's turn when one of your Holomen is knocked down: Reassign all green cheers from your one of your downed Holomen to your other Holomen.

spOshiSkill.name: 幸運兎  ("Lucky Rabbit")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once pere game] During this turn, treat all your dice rolls as 6
